price: Сизга даъволашгувчилар хабари келдими? Ўшанда улар меҳробга чиқишганди.
arabic: ۞ وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَصۡمِ إِذۡ تَسَوَّرُواْ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wahal atāka naba-u al-khaṣmi idh tasawwarū al-miḥ'rāba
